The hamburger menu at the bottom-right (or bottom-left in left handed mode) has your WalkPedia to help track your total progress.

Rescue team
Main Skill: Agility
Max Efficiency: 150%

Use information from the search teams to actively go and carry out rescue operations.

The Rescue team activity is a Agility activity.

Location

This activity can be done at the following location:

  • Horn of Respite in Jarvonia

Requirements

Skill Level Requirements:

  • At least Agility lvl. 30.

Keyword Requirements:

  • Have Climbing gear equipped.
  • Have Skis equipped.

Other Requirements:

  • Have [20] achievement points.

Visibility

This activity is always visible.
